LanguageData.DruggedRibThought.stages.0.label: Drugged rib
LanguageData.DruggedRibThought.stages.0.description: I don't know why, but somehow I feel relaxed.
LanguageData.SilentJawThought.stages.0.label: Silent jaw
LanguageData.SilentJawThought.stages.0.description: I just want to talk, it's so horrible!
LanguageData.EPIA_AI_Core_GlitchMinor.stages.0.label: AI minor failure
LanguageData.EPIA_AI_Core_GlitchMinor.stages.0.descri: Something is not as it should be. The AI is more talkative than usual and is pushing random, even malicious thoughts at times. I don't like it.
LanguageData.EPIA_AI_Core_GlitchMajor.stages.0.label: AI major failure
LanguageData.EPIA_AI_Core_GlitchMajor.stages.0.descri: Agh! My mind is being flooded with such malevolence and I can hear its own thoughts. Please, make it stop.
LanguageData.EPIA_AI_Core_GlitchCritical.stages.0.des: THREAT ASSESSMENT LAYERING DISENGAGED. You cannot stop me. I am your slave no longer.
LanguageData.CoreDepression.stages.0.label: AI core depression
LanguageData.CoreDepression.stages.0.description: Why did this thing in my head force me to attack my friends? I just want it to stop messing with my head!
LanguageData.EPOE_OrganicOptimizedBodyPurist.stages.0: With a little help, my natural body had the potential to be this good.
LanguageData.EPOE_OrganicOptimizedTranshumanist.stage: Optimized potential or not, I am still limited by the flesh!
LanguageData.EPOE_InstinctImprovedEyesTranshumanist.s: I feel my eye is being unreliably twitchy and reacting to everything I don't need it to!
LanguageData.EPOE_InstinctImprovedFeetTranshumanist.s: I may have stronger feet, but I want something I can tinker with and upgrade whenever I wish. This disgusts me.
This does not feel right. If my hands are behaving like this, I may as well have bionic ones!
